PHP Cloud_Py_API Core API

OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Framework\Core

Cloud_Py_API Framework Core API class

runBgGrpcServer(array $params = []): int

Run non-blocking GRPC server

Parameters

  • $params (array) – hostname, port, userid, appname, handler, modname, modpath, funcname, args

Returns

int - background GRPC server PID or -1 on failure

createServer(array $params = []): RpcServer

Create GRPC server

Parameters

  • $params (array) – hostname and port

Returns

\Grpc\RpcServer

createClient(array $params = []): CloudPyApiCoreClient

Create GRPC client

Parameters

  • $params (array) – hostname and port

Returns

OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Proto\CloudPyApiCoreClient

TaskInit($client): CloudPyApiCoreClient

Send TaskInit request from given client

Parameters

  • $client (OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Proto\CloudPyApiCoreClient) – GRPC client

Returns

array [‘response’ => OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Proto\TaskInitReply, ‘status’ => [‘metadata’, ‘code’, ‘details’]]

TaskStatus($client, $params = []): void

Send TaskLog request

Parameters

  • $params (OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Proto\CloudPyApiCoreClient) – GRPC client

Returns

void

TaskLog($client, $params = []): void

Send TaskLog request

Parameters

  • $client (OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Proto\CloudPyApiCoreClient) – GRPC client

  • $params (array) – [‘logLvl’, ‘module’, ‘content’]

Returns

void

TaskExit($client, $params = []): void

Send TaskExit request with passing $result to initiator callback and closing server process

Parameters

  • $client (OCA\Cloud_Py_API\Proto\CloudPyApiCoreClient) – GRPC client

  • $params (array) – [‘result’ => mixed]

Returns

void
